## 11. LOWLAND
### Definition
An area that is relatively low above sea level, as opposed to ‘mountains’. In Daghestan the term refers to the strip of land along the Caspian sea.

### Contexts
1. Мой сын уехал жить на равнину. 2. У нашего селения есть пастбища на равнине. 3. Мы собрались на поляне (на ровном месте). 1. My son went to live in the lowland. 2. Our village has pastures on the lowland. 3. We gathered at a plain (at a flat area).
